original_text: Some of the Jews were persuaded and joined Paul and Silas, as did a large number of God-fearing Greeks and quite a few prominent women.
korean_text: 그 중의 어떤 사람 곧 경건한 헬라인의 큰 무리와 적지 않은 귀부인도 권함을 받고 바울과 실라를 따르나

sentences.original_text: Some of the Jews were persuaded
as did a large number of God-fearing Greeks
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 하나님을 경외하는 많은 헬라인들이 그랬던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: and quite a few prominent women
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 적지 않은 저명한 여인들도 또한 그랬다
